title: Ali Zaidi appreciates FIA for recovering stolen files of KPT
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 27 (APP): Minister for Maritime Affairs Ali Haider Zaidi on Tuesday appreciated Federal Investigation Agency (FIA) Karachi office owing to their brilliant work in recovering the stolen files of Karachi Port Trust (KPT).
In a tweet, he said “Ministry of Maritime Affairs will not tolerate any corruption in the organizations under its wings”. “We will also expose name & shame the culprits very soon”, he added.
Must appreciate the brilliant work by @PakistanFia Karachi office in recovering the stolen files of @official_kpt @MaritimeGovPK will not tolerate any corruption in the organizations under its wings. We will also expose + name & shame the culprits very soon.
— Ali Haider Zaidi (@AliHZaidiPTI) April 27, 2021
